text: Gulshan Ara Akter Champa is a Bangladeshi film and television actress. ==Awards and achievements== National Film Awards Year Award Category Film Result 1993 National Film Awards Best actress Padma Nadir Majhi 1995 National Film Award Best actress Onno Jibon 2000 National Film Award Best actress Uttarer Khep 2005 National Film Award Best co-actress Shasti 2008 National Film Award Best co-actress Chandragrohon ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi actors
title: Champa
